name: Shoot, push, portals
summary:
At the levels of Shoot, push, portals, everything falls, burns and explodes. Try to solve the puzzle using only gravity! Your task is to deliver the blue ball to the platform. Interesting levels, beautiful music, lots of fun! All this is waiting for you!

Oh yes, there are still portals here!
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 休闲
  • 游戏引擎: Clickteam Fusion 2.5
  • 游玩人数: 1
